(the "Software"), to copy and distribute it freely, provided that this
license text is contained in all copies made. Different rules apply to
the different software components, as follows:

(*) All source code files (C/C++/Java/Python/Matlab) may be modified
    without restriction and used for any purpose, in particular for the
    purpose of participating in the black box optimization competition.

(*) The software libraries in binary format must not be used for any
    purpose other than participation in the black box optimization
    competition. They must not be disassembled and/or reverse
    engineered, and their network traffic must not be decoded,
    redirected, or modified.

EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.
